pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: :v: erdOne can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7018380675/job/19093663925)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7018380675/job/19093663440)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7018380675/job/19093664155)

I think we can remove the porting note. Also the comment is now useless if this is an instance, right?

Is `FractionRing.liftAlgebra` now an instance too?
No. `FractionRing.liftAlgebra` still cannot be an instance.

You may write `S <= [IsUnit.submonoid](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/GroupTheory/Submonoid/Basic.html#IsUnit.submonoid) R` if you want (found by Moogle, didn't know it existed)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: `IsFractionRing R R` if `R` is a field.
